author: The_Reviewer
title: an okay free item
review:
I got this free at TRU on the deal where you buy any lego set you get one free lego lighthouse.I'am not a fan of the Creator theme ,but this is a pretty good nick nack. The build is very straight forward;all you do is stack the peices and that's it.If you like Creator sets than this is more of your kind of set,but I do not really like lighthouses or creator sets.Overall this set has no playabillity;so it's only a displaypiece .

    By the way;a great MOC idea you can do whith this set is if you build your own minature Golf course for you Lego City;this would make a great Thing for a Ligthouse Hole.(You hit the ball into the lighthouse)

author: Odeinoichus
title: Fun Mini-Model
review:
Set #30023 Lighthouse: Creator is not a Theme I follow too closely, there are of course certain sets I'm interested in acquiring. However for the most part I leave the Theme alone, as a Polybagged Enthusiast though there are some sets that intrigue me, and there are also some that languish around at TRU for months/years at a time that I finally just have to pick up because they look lonely.

This little model represents a lighthouse in a miniature scale (or microbuild if you prefer), it uses 25 pieces in total which is fairly standard for most Polybagged sets. There are red, white, gray, black, clear yellow and brown pieces used in this microbuild and I've got to say the finished model does look like what its aiming for. (There are some microbuilds which fail miserably.)

An interesting thing to note, if you enjoy building microscaled dioramas of towns and cities this set includes a piece that allows for modular connectability to another set. With an extra technic piece from your collection you can fit this model onto another model using the 2x2 brick with peg-hole found at the rear of the model. As a parts bag it doesn't offer much in the way of truly unique pieces, I still think it is a solid looking item and well worth picking up. Especially for diorama and polybag enthusiasts.
